channel.title: Project
channel.description:
My project needs a very good website designer. Not an amatuer site designer but a very good designer.[b] In return you would get 75% of the profits (around $5000 a year) and the rest of the profits would go towards further development of the site.[/b]
I need someone who can programme the following: [b]League Tables A forum An admin and mod control panel Teamsheets (will be explained) A chatbox Automatic updating system (will be explained) A unique IP tracking and banning system. [/b]
If you want more details or if your interested in this add my msn. hani.h@hotmail.co.uk
This site has the potential to earn lots of money as another similar version of this idea become very successful.
